mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM, LNTC.LEC_NTC_CD AS LEC_NTC_CD, LNTC.TITLE AS TITLE, MJ.NAME AS NAME , TO_CHAR(LNTC.CRT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRT_DATE , LNTC.HITS AS HITS , LNTC.LEC_NTC_CD AS LEC_NTC_CD FROM TBL_LEC_NTC LNTC, TBL_LEC L, TBL_PROF P, TBL_MEM_JOIN MJ WHERE LNTC.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND L.PROF_CD = P.PROF_CD AND P.MEM_CD = MJ.MEM_CD AND LNTC.LEC_CD = #{lec_cd}
